com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

Interface ICalendarEntryRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCalendarEntryRenderer, WeekendCalendarEntryRenderer

    public interface ICalendarEntryRenderer
extends IRenderer
    A renderer specialized on rendering calendar entries.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    CalendarLayer.setCalendarEntryRenderer(Class, ICalendarEntryRenderer), ICalendarModel, ICalendarEntry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component getCalendarEntryRendererComponent(CalendarLayer layer, Object calendarEntry)
      Returns a component that will be used to render (visualize) the given calendar entry object.

    • Method Detail

      • getCalendarEntryRendererComponent

        Component getCalendarEntryRendererComponent(CalendarLayer layer,
                                            Object calendarEntry)
        Returns a component that will be used to render (visualize) the given calendar entry object.
        Parameters:
        layer - the calendar layer that is asking for a renderer component
        calendarEntry - the calendar entry object in need of rendering
        Returns:
        a renderer component
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        CalendarLayer, ICalendarModel, ICalendarEntry
